short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads the selected text, selected text reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a context menu (right-click menu) item, allowing users to have selected text read aloud. It also features a popup that lets users select the language and speed at which the text is read.
